feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-11-18T02:14:52.872703Z; ; ; <作者>; <名称>;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;OpenAI 董事会解雇了 Sam Altman</stitle>; <id>;https://openai.com/blog/openai-announces-leadership-transition</id>; <updated>;2023- 11-17T21:14:48.716650Z</updated>; <link href="https://openai.com/blog/openai-announces-leadership-transition"/>; <作者>; <name>;davidbarker</name>; <uri >;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=davidbarker</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://images.openai.com/blob/9eb94b23 -a383-4771-884f-cc1d88e296bd/brand-guidelines.png?trim=0%2C0%2C0%2C0&width=1000&quality=80" style="宽度：220px；高度：220px；" />;<br />;在 Sam Altman 离职后，OpenAI 首席技术官 Mira Murati 被任命为临时首席执行官。董事会认为，米拉的经验和对公司的了解使她非常适合担任这一职位。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#openai-s-board-has-fired-sam-altman" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38309611" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Greg Brockman 退出 OpenAI</stitle>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=nickrubin</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;出了点问题，但不要担心 - 让我们再试一次。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#greg-brockman-quits-openai" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator. com/item?id=38312704" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml" >; <title type="text">;我破解了 Magic Mouse</stitle>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=nmstoker</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://i0. wp.​​com/uplab.pro/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/PXL_20231117_1228195082.jpg?resize=1024%2C771&ssl=1" style="宽度：220px；高度：166px；" />;<br />;我破解了 Magic Mouse，创造了世界上第一款符合人体工学、没有任何弱点的 Magic Mouse。您可以在工作时通过 USB-C 充电。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#i-hacked-the-magic-mouse" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <id>;https://www. axios.com/2023/11/17/microsoft-openai-sam-altman-ouster</id>; <更新>;2023-11-18T00:14:48.720303Z</更新>; <link href="https://www .axios.com/2023/11/17/microsoft-openai-sam-altman-ouster"/>; <作者>; <名称>;aaronds</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id =aaronds</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#microsoft-was-blindside-by-openai-s-ouster-of- ceo-sam-altman" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38312372" target="_blank">;[评论]< /a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;电动汽车电池价格下降速度快于预期</stitle>; <id>;https://www.goldmansachs.com/intelligence/pages/electric-vehicle-battery-prices-falling.html</id>; <更新>;2023-11-17T15:14:48.720799Z< /updated>; <link href="https://www.goldmansachs.com/intelligence/pages/electric-vehicle-battery-prices-falling.html"/>; <作者>; <名称>;dakna</名称>; <uri>; https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=dakna</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.goldmansachs.com/intelligence/pages/电动车电池价格-falling-f/800x450.png" style="width: 220px;高度：124px;" />;<br />;到 2025 年，电动汽车 (EV) 的电池价格预计将降至每千瓦时 (kWh) 99 美元，较 2022 年下降 40%。这一下降是由于锂、镍和钴等电动汽车原材料的价格下降。随着电池价格下降，电动汽车市场可能会在本世纪中期实现与内燃机 (ICE) 汽车的成本平价。<a href="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/#electric-vehicle-battery-prices-are-falling-faster-than-expected" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator .com/item?id=38304405" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml ">; <title type="text">;Xash3D：半条命的开源重新实现</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/FWGS/xash3d-fwgs</id>; <更新>;2023- 11-17T21:14:48.721825Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/FWGS/xash3d-fwgs"/>; <author>; <name>;mepian</name>; <uri>;https:// /news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mepian</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/FWGS/xash3d-fwgs/master /game_launch/icon-xash-material.png" style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;Xash3D FWGS 是一个游戏引擎，旨在提供与 Half-Life 引擎的兼容性并对其进行扩展。它是由 Unkle Mike 对原始 Xash3D 引擎进行重大修改的分支。 <a href ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#xash3d-an-open-source-reimplementation-of-half-life" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// /news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38309970" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io /feed.xml">; <title type="text">;显示 HN：nbi.ai – 生成式商业智能</stitle>; <id>;https://www.narrative.bi/ai</id>; <更新>;2023 -11-17T22:14:48.722333Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.narrative.bi/ai"/>; <作者>; <name>;fromthegut</name>; <uri>;https:// news.ycombinator.com/user?id=fromthegut</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://assets-global.website-files.com/5edf3eeece4c854c7119209b/6486d86e1b809d25781d58bd_ai-英雄插图.png" style="width: 220px; height: 277px;" />;<br />;Narrative 提供了一种从 Google Analytics 和其他工具获取最重要指标的方法，让代表客户更轻松地做出日常决策。Narrative 中的浓缩见解非常有用，现在在我们的日常工具组合中不可或缺。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-nbi-ai-generative-business-intelligence" target="_blank">;[summary]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38310502" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;2023 年 10 月柚子进度报告</stitle>; <id>;https://yuzu-emu.org/entry/yuzu-progress -report-oct-2023/</id>; <更新>;2023-11-18T01:14:48.722828Z</更新>; <link href="https://yuzu-emu.org/entry/yuzu-progress-report -oct-2023/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;0xDEADFED5</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=0xDEADFED5</uri>; </author>; <content type=" html">;<img src="https://yuzu-emu.org/entry/yuzu-progress-report-oct-2023/wonder1_hu980adc554ff5c9e1c33b52c71d63f429_1591694_1024x0_resize_q90_bgffffff_box_3.jpg" style="宽度: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;上个月，柚子在 GPU 修复、Android 构建和游戏兼容性方面取得了重大进展。他们还解决了深度模板、Vulkan 内存分配、查询缓存内存泄漏、格式支持等问题。以及 NVIDIA GPU 上的鲁棒性。Android 版本获得了 UI 改进、设备兼容性增强以及对 Windows 的快捷方式创建支持。他们还进行了更改以改进用户 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#yuzu-progress -report-october-2023" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38312974" target="_blank">;[评论] </a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;撇号保护协会</stitle>; < id>;https://www.apostrope.org.uk</id>; <更新>;2023-11-17T18:14:48.723292Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.apostrope.org.uk "/>; <author>; <name>;Tomte</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Tomte</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://static.wixstatic.com/media/792392_a35853e0a3f941bb82356e7dfa8ac448~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_274,h_182,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_auto/shutterstock_397584811_6 64736701792_JPG.jpg"样式="宽度：220px； height: 147px;" />;<br />;撇号保护协会成立于 2001 年，旨在保护撇号的正确使用。在短暂关闭后，新主席鲍勃·麦卡尔登 (Bob McCalden) 重新启动了该协会，以继续其使命. <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#apostrope-protection-society" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com /item?id=38306680" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;一款关于凝视陌生人眼睛的游戏</stitle>; <id>;https://stranger.video/</id>; <更新>;2023-11-17T17:14:48.723759Z </更新>; <link href="https://stranger.video/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;underanalyzer</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=underanalyzer< /uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://stranger.video/static/social1200x630.png" style="width: 220px;高度：116px;" />;<br />;这个网站可以让你和陌生人看到彼此的脸。它没有做太多其他事情。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat. io/#a-game-about-staring-into-the-eyes-of-a-stranger" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com /item?id=38305787" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Meta 增强现实软件负责人辞职</stitle>; <id>;https://www.reuters.com/technology/metas-head-augmented-reality-software-stepping-down-2023 -11-17/</id>; <更新>;2023-11-17T22:14:48.725722Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.reuters.com/technology/metas-head-augmented-reality -software-stepping-down-2023-11-17/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;JeremyNT</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=JeremyNT</uri>; < /author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cloudfront-us-east-2.images.arcpublishing.com/reuters/TNXJBQAHB5OZRKQYCGC4UJQQO4.jpg" style="width: 220px;高度：146px;" />;<br />;Meta 的增强现实软件负责人周五向路透社表示，该公司的增强现实软件负责人即将卸任，这引发了对该公司为其计划中的 AR 眼镜开发定制操作系统的进展的质疑。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#meta-s-head-of-augmented-reality-software-stepping-down" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38311144" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;燃气轮机如何征服电力行业</stitle>; <id>;https://www.construction-physicals.com/p/how -the-gas-turbine-conquered-the</id>; <更新>;2023-11-17T19:14:48.726197Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.construction-physicals.com/p/ how-the-gas-turbine-conquered-the"/>; <作者>; <名称>;jseliger</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jseliger</uri>; </author >; <content type="html">;<img src="https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1344,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-post- media.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2Fa96fbbab-34e6-48cd-a978-efb5e7552d2d_590x284.png" style="宽度：220px; height: 106px;" />;<br />;燃气轮机的部署时间比蒸汽轮机更长，但最终征服了电力行业。蒸汽轮机最初由于更高的效率和更低的回功比而更加成功，但压缩机技术的进步更高的工作温度使燃气轮机能够赶上并超越蒸汽轮机。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#how-the-gas-turbine-conquered-the-electric-power-industry"目标="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38307596" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;沃尔沃交付 74 吨电动卡车</stitle>; <id>;https: //www.volvotrucks.com/en-en/news-stories/press-releases/2023/jun/volvo-delivers-74-tonne-electric-truck.html</id>; <更新>;2023-11-17T13： 14:48.726703Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.volvotrucks.com/en-en/news-stories/press-releases/2023/jun/volvo-delivers-74-tonne-electric-truck .html"/>; <作者>; <名称>;clouddrover </名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=clouddrover</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">; <img src="https://assets.volvo.com/is/image/VolvoInformationTechnologyAB/Volvo-High-Capacity-Transport-1?wid=1024" style="width: 220px;高度: 147px;" />;<br />;越来越多的运输商正在投资用于重型运输的电动卡车。瑞典哥德堡的 Mattson Åkeri 购买了三辆重型电动沃尔沃 FH 卡车，并正在集装箱运输中进行测试。这些卡车可以处理组合总重为 74 吨，采用绿色电力充电。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#volvo-delivers-74-tonne-electric-truck" target="_blank">;[summary ]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38302844" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml :base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;反混淆《战舰世界》的 Python 脚本</stitle>; <id>;https://landaire.net/world -of-warships-deobfuscation/</id>; <更新>;2023-11-17T18:14:48.727184Z</更新>; <link href="https://landaire.net/world-of-warships-deobfuscation/" />; <author>; <name>;lukastyrychtr</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=lukastyrychtr</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src =“https://landaire.net/processed_images/header.e36508feb1e669d9.png”样式=“宽度：220px； height: 220px;" />;<br />;文章讨论了《战舰世界》中游戏脚本反混淆的过程以及对代码进行逆向工程所面临的挑战。作者分享了自己用于反混淆的工具和技术，以及游戏开发者用来混淆代码的技巧。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#deobfuscating-world-of-warships-python-scripts" target="_blank">;[summary]</ a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38302033" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base= "https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;50 年后以太网仍然强劲</stitle>; <id>;https://spectrum.ieee.org/ethernet -ieee-milestone</id>; <更新>;2023-11-17T12:14:48.727672Z</更新>; <link href="https://spectrum.ieee.org/ethernet-ieee-milestone"/>; <作者>; <name>;pseudolus</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=pseudolus</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https: //spectrum.ieee.org/media-library/close-up-of-ethernet-cable-with-clear-fibres-in-the-background.jpg?id=50494003&width=1200&height=900" style="width: 220px ; height: 165px;" />;<br />;以太网是一种允许通过同轴电缆进行高速数据传输的网络技术，于 1973 年在 Xerox Palo Alto 研究中心开发出来。它已成为周围地区的标准有线局域网。世界各地，广泛应用于企业和家庭。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#ethernet-is-still-going-strong-after-50-years" target="_blank">;[summary ]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38302283" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml :base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;五角大楼连续第六年未通过审计</stitle>; <id>;https://brokingdefense.com /2023/11/with-trillions-at-play-pentagon-fails-audit-for-sixth-year-in-a-row/</id>; <更新>;2023-11-17T17:14:48.728640Z</已更新>; <link href="https://writingdefense.com/2023/11/with-trillions-at-play-pentagon-fails-audit-for-sixth-year-in-a-row/"/>; <作者>; <name>;TurkishPoptart</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=TurkishPoptart</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https: //sites.breakmedia.com/uploads/sites/3/2023/11/pentagon3-scaled.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 120px;" />;<br />;五角大楼连续第六年未通过年度审计，但却声称取得了进展。审计检查了 29 个实体，只有 7 个实体获得了干净的审计。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#pentagon-fails-audit-for-sixth-year-in-a-row" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38306174" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;显示 HN：Beta 测试执行程序的交互式“Python for Programmers”课程</stitle>; <id>;https://www.executeprogram.com/courses/ python-for-programmers</id>; <更新>;2023-11-17T16:14:48.729106Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.executeprogram.com/courses/python-for-programmers"/ >; <作者>; <名称>;gary_bernhardt</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=gary_bernhardt</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;<img src= “https://www.executeprogram.com/images/twitter-card.png”样式=“宽度：220px； height: 220px;" />;<br />;快速学习 JavaScript、TypeScript、SQL 和正则表达式等编程工具。带有真实代码示例的互动课程。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show -hn-beta-test-execute-program-s-interactive-python-for-programmers-course" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <id>;https://blog.sentry.io/introducing-the-function-source-license-freedom-without-free-riding/< /id>; <更新>;2023-11-17T17:14:48.729596Z</更新>; <link href="https://blog.sentry.io/introducing-the-function-source-license-freedom-without-free -riding/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;aviks</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=aviks</uri>; </author>; <content type="html" >;<img src="https://images.ctfassets.net/em6l9zw4tzag/SudR9frnhwuJ6rkomJEx6/6428719564fe2631321e51be536e077d/Chad-Whitacre.png" style="宽度：220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;Sentry 宣布他们将根据名为功能源许可证 (FSL) 的新许可证重新授权 Sentry 和 Codecov。FSL 是业务源许可证 (BSL) 的演变，旨在平衡用户自由和开发者可持续性。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#sentry-relicense-again-fsl" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <id>;https://theconversation.com/the-worlds- 2.8 亿辆电动自行车和轻便摩托车正在削减石油需求，远远超过电动汽车213870</id>; <更新>;2023-11-17T15:14:48.731055Z </更新>; <link href="https://theconversation.com/the-worlds-280-million-electric-bikes-and-mopeds-are-cutting-demand-for-oil-far-more-than-electric -cars-213870"/>; <作者>; <名称>;rglullis </名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=rglullis</uri>; </author>; <content type="html ">;<img src="https://images.theconversation.com/files/559537/original/file-20231115-25-497qt1.jpg?ixlib=rb-1.1.0&rect=14%2C0%2C2481%2C1661&q=20&auto =格式&w=320&fit=剪辑&dpr=2&usm=12&cs=条形" style="宽度：220px; height: 148px;" />;<br />;电动微型交通工具（例如电动自行车和轻便摩托车）所取代的石油需求量是全球电动汽车的四倍。电动轻便摩托车、踏板车、摩托车和摩托车的数量超过 2.8 亿辆去年，三轮汽车上路，使石油需求减少了世界石油总需求的约 1%。电动微型交通的购买和运行成本比电动汽车更便宜，使其成为短途旅行的可行替代方案。<a href=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/#280m-e-bikes-and-mopeds-are-cutting-demand-for-oil-far-more-than-electric-cars" target="_blank">;[摘要] </a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38304485" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml: base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;PCIe Coral TPU 终于可以在 Raspberry Pi 5 上运行</stitle>; <id>;https://www.jeffgeerling .com/blog/2023/pcie-coral-tpu-finally-works-on-raspberry-pi-5</id>; <更新>;2023-11-17T20:14:48.731531Z</更新>; <link href=" https://www.jeffgeerling.com/blog/2023/pcie-coral-tpu-finally-works-on-raspberry-pi-5"/>; <作者>; <名称>;mikece </名称>; <uri>;https： //news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mikece</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.jeffgeerling.com/sites/default/files/图片/google-coral-tpu-pcie-raspberry-pi-5.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 147px;" />;<br />;Coral.ai TPU 是用于机器视觉和音频处理等任务的 AI 加速器。Raspberry Pi 通常集成到小型机器人和物联网产品中，或用于使用 Frigate 分析实时视频源。直到今天，据我所知，没有人能够在 Raspberry Pi 上使用 PCI Express Coral TPU。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a-pcie-coral-tpu-finally-works -on-raspberry-pi-5" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38308552" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Rocket v0.5：稳定，异步</stitle>; <id>;https://rocket.rs/v0.5/news/2023-11-17-version-0.5/</id>; <更新>;2023-11-17T18:14:48.731993Z </更新>; <link href="https://rocket.rs/v0.5/news/2023-11-17-version-0.5/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;sbenitez </名称>; <uri>; https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=sbenitez</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Rocket v0.5 经过四年的开发现已推出。它是 Rust 的异步后端 Web 框架，专注于可用性、安全性、可扩展性和速度。新版本引入了许多改进和功能。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#rocket-v0-5-stable-async" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=38306540​​" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;芯片状态和 GPU 较差</stitle>; <id>;https://www.latent.space/p/semianalysis</id>; <更新>;2023-11- 17T20:14:48.732395Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.latent.space/p/semianalysis"/>; <作者>; <name>;swyx</name>; <uri>;https://news .ycombinator.com/user?id=swyx</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_512,h_512,c_fill,f_auto ,q_auto:好,fl_progressive:陡峭/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-post-media.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2F13a77f44-8bed-44b5-bdfd-ff7e10826ed8_1400x1400.png" style="width: 220px;高度：220px；” />;<br />;文章讨论了GPU供应状况以及下一代AI的FLOPS需求。它还探讨了“GPU 匮乏”或“GPU 丰富”的概念以及对不同公司和个人的影响。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-state-of-silicon-and-the-gpu-poors" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38309014" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
